intro.placeholder: Write a brief description about your component.

comp_functionality.placeholder: Explain the basic functionality of your component.

usecase.placeholder: Explain what use cases it is best used for and what problems it is solving.

prerequisites.placeholder: Mention any pre-requisites or dependencies of the component.

importing_the_component.placeholder: Please explain the steps to import your component.

adding_the_component.key: Adding The Component To Your Application
adding_the_component.placeholder: Please explain the steps to use your component.

description.placeholder: Describe the API and its functionality

limitations.placeholder: Mention the limitations of you component if any. Eg: Platform limitations, orientation etc.

known_issues.placeholder: Mention any known issues or bugs in the component.

misc.placeholder: Any additional information about the component that will be useful for the component consumer.
